mapper.select: select data.uid, data.openid, data.stockmax, data.stock, data.gold, data.diamond, data.newgamer, data.sound, data.biggestanimalid, data.viplv, data.todaysign, data.weeksign, data.rounds, data.vipreward, data.rankchallengenum, data.refreshworldnum, data.speedincubate, data.lastweekrank, data.lastweekreward, data.totalincubate, data.lasttime, data.rankpermission, data.phonefare, data.phonefarenumber, data.sitedata, data.animaldata, data.taskdata, info.avatar as avatar , info.nickname as nickname from player_data data left join player_info info on data.openid=info.openid where data.openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into player_data (uid, openid, stockmax, stock, gold, diamond, newgamer, sound, biggestanimalid, viplv, todaysign, weeksign, rounds, vipreward, rankchallengenum, refreshworldnum, speedincubate, lastweekrank, lastweekreward, totalincubate, lasttime, rankpermission, phonefare, phonefarenumber, sitedata, animaldata, taskdata ) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockmax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{diamond,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newgamer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sound,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{biggestanimalid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viplv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{todaysign,jdbcType=BIT}, #{weeksign,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rounds,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipreward,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rankchallengenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refreshworldnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{speedincubate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastweekrank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastweekreward,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalincubate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rankpermission,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phonefare,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phonefarenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sitedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{animaldata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
